title: Dark Master
description: This is the newly edited version of the original story. Mercer’s convinced that being a good girl hasn’t gotten her anywhere when it comes to love. She’s looking for something more than the average man has to offer. She wants to experiment and is willing to pay to find pleasure. Little does she know that she’s about to be taught a lesson that she’ll never forget. Weis may not have seen her coming, but now that he’s found her, he’s not willing to let her escape easily. Earning her trust won’t be easy. He fights against his vampire instincts and tries to remain a gentleman. But there is nothing that can stop the beast within him from claiming her for himself. This is the second installment of the "Dark Vampire Series" written by Jade Cooper, published by eroticaromance.netThis book is considered erotica writing. The author uses language and situations that some people may find offensive.
author: Jade Cooper
